image:image.image:title: creative - Pizzicato Pizza
image:image.image:caption: This is a song I worked on for a bit to test out some new concepts. For a more detailed walkthrough on how I created it see my blog post: http://bit.ly/2fqydZV Music: - Presonus Studio One 3 - BFD3 Drums - Presence XT Strings - Guitar: Epiphone Wildkat - Amp: Vox AC15C2 - Zoom H6 Interface - 5 string bass Video - Panasonic GH3 - Editing with Edius 8.2 - Graded with Magic Bullet Looks

image:image.image:title: creative - Sante Fe Night Sky
image:image.image:caption: Working on first capturing the night sky, I was freezing for hours in the cold at 20F to get this. However, the time outside enjoying the beauty of the stars was well worth it

image:image.image:title: creative - faulkey gully after flood
image:image.image:caption: After hurricane harvey, floodwaters rose pretty high.

image:image.image:title: creative - Water spraying
image:image.image:caption: Water is one of the most interesting things to capture in pictures with it's movement. My son was having some fun with family and I found this a great moment to be looking at him through a sheet of water heading my way. Thankfully he missed me.

image:image.image:title: blog - ANTS Performance Profiler for the SQL Server Dev - ANTS Timeline
image:image.image:caption: The timeline is incredibly useful as you can perform actions in the application while "live bookmarking". This allows you to easily go back through a series of actions you performed and analyze the results without trying to sift through a huge timeline of calls.

image:image.image:title: blog - Welcome to the World Little Ella - Ella
image:image.image:caption: 6 lbs 11 ounces.

image:image.image:title: blog - Welcome to the World Little Ella - Ella
image:image.image:caption: Sleepy head

image:image.image:title: blog - Welcome to the World Little Ella - Ella
image:image.image:caption: she woke up pretty quick, and started trying to look around despite the bright lights of the OR

image:image.image:title: blog - Welcome to the World Little Ella - Ella
image:image.image:caption: Inky toes

image:image.image:title: blog - Welcome to the World Little Ella - Ella
image:image.image:caption: she's a bit bummed at the bright lights and being poked. the nurses did an admirable job however.

image:image.image:title: blog - Welcome to the World Little Ella - Ella
image:image.image:caption: Momma had a rough time, and had to wait a few minutes to hold Ella. They had a beautiful moment together just looking at each other while momma finished recovery

image:image.image:title: blog - Welcome to the World Little Ella - Ella
image:image.image:caption: Yes... I'm a proud dad!

image:image.image:title: blog - Welcome to the World Little Ella - Ella
image:image.image:caption: being swaddled

image:image.image:title: blog - Welcome to the World Little Ella - Ella
image:image.image:caption: was surprised at how fast she opened those eyes to explore. Bright lights did little to deter her

image:image.image:title: blog - Welcome to the World Little Ella - Ella
image:image.image:caption: Trying to figure out who the masked wierdo with the camera was....

image:image.image:title: blog - Welcome to the World Little Ella - Ella
image:image.image:caption: Getting hungry

image:image.image:title: blog - Welcome to the World Little Ella - Ella
image:image.image:caption: Out of surgery, Sarah is relishing the time with her little angel

image:image.image:title: blog - Welcome to the World Little Ella - Ella
image:image.image:caption: Snuggling with my girl

image:image.image:caption: Grandma visiting again before taking off to help us with the kiddos
